hero.title: Connect your patients, your procedures, and your decisions in a single operational loop.
hero.subtitle: Smart & Intuitive
hero.description: OpenCare orchestrates care in real-time: AI coordination, enhanced records, and immediate analytics. Designed as a clinical cockpit to synchronize field, planning cell, and patient management.

coordination.title: AI Coordination
coordination.description: OR, bed, imaging, and logistics aligned

rightCard.title: Regain control over your critical workflows.
rightCard.description: An interface designed by practitioners to eliminate bottlenecks, centralize information, and simplify your daily decisions.

efficient.title: Efficient
efficient.description: Reduces information search time and phone calls

organized.title: Organized
organized.description: All your tasks, documents, and patients in one place

videoModal.unsupported: Your browser does not support video playback.

planning.title: Tasks & Activities
planning.description: Create and manage your daily tasks and service instructions directly after your visits. Coordinate with your colleagues in real-time and ensure no clinical action is forgotten.

highlights.create: Create and assign tasks to your team

patients.title: Patients
patients.description: Build and consult your patient database with quick and detailed overviews. Revisit files, edit information, and add your clinical observations in just a few clicks.

editor.title: Intelligent Editor
editor.description: Let our intelligent editor suggest what you need to write. It analyzes patient data, lab values, and metadata to auto-fill prescriptions and clinical observations.

analytics.title: Analytics
analytics.description: View, create, and share biological, imaging, and pathology analyses for your team. Search by test type, patient name, or period, and capture lab results directly by photo for automatic filling.

highlights.management: Biological, imaging, and pathology analysis management
highlights.search: Search by test type, patient, or period

documents.title: Documents & Templates
documents.description: Stop writing your documents from scratch. Access a complete suite of pre-filled templates for prescriptions and reports. Adapt, finalize, and sign in seconds without wasting time.

highlights.reports: Reports with suggested structure and content

about.title: A complete suite designed by physicians for physicians and residents.
about.description: OpenCare is an integrated studio to manage your tasks, patients, analyses, and documents. Explore each module and discover how to simplify your daily clinical routine.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions from care teams.
faq.subtitle: Need clarification? Our project team supports you for a smooth deployment.

security.question: Is my patient data secure?
security.answer: Yes. OpenCare uses end-to-end encryption and secure infrastructure compliant with hospital standards. Your data remains under your control.

customization.question: Can practitioners customize their dashboards?
customization.answer: Each practitioner benefits from a customizable space: patient filters, statistical tiles, notification preferences, and exports adapted to their specialty.

mobile.question: Do you offer a mobile application?
mobile.answer: A Progressive Web App is available to view your patient lists, access protocols, and respond quickly to critical notifications. A mobile application is under development.

users.question: Which teams can use OpenCare?
users.answer: Interns, Residents, Specialists, anesthesiologists, nurse anesthetists, OR managers, care coordinators, and imaging/laboratory services: the platform facilitates inter-disciplinary collaboration.

assistance.question: How does assistance work?
assistance.answer: 24/7 support, dedicated project manager, and interactive tutorial library. You can contact our experts via secure chat or dedicated hotline.

integration.question: How does OpenCare integrate with existing service tools?
integration.answer: OpenCare works in complement to your hospital software. You can import your patients via Excel files, synchronize laboratory data via photo/scan, and export all your documents in PDF for integration into the service medical record. No radical workflow change is necessary: the tool adapts to your organization.

contact.title: Let's schedule a personalized demonstration for your service.
contact.subtitle: Share some information: an OpenCare expert will contact you within 24h to understand your challenges and define a deployment plan.

benefits.security: Secure infrastructure and strong authentication included.
benefits.roadmap: AI roadmap shared with your team to improve pathways.
benefits.support: Dedicated support for practitioners and hospital organization units.

form.messagePlaceholder: Tell us about your challenges or specific needs.
form.success: Your request has been sent successfully. We will contact you within 24h.
form.privacy: We will contact you within 24 business hours. Data is secure and used only for tracking your request.

footer.subtitle: Clinical Orchestrator
